dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1950
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tales from each stop of a long journey from New York through Cleveland, Chicago, St. Louis, Tulsa to Amarillo, Texas. Tells of many efforts at the works of mercy, learning to make rosaries, lectures, liturgies, and enduring suffering.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 606 1950-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
